message: Just then, my Coil beeps. I have a message.
This time, it's an invitation to Oval Tower.

name: クリア
message: "It must be one of Toue's traps."
It's probably a trap, like Clear said.
Those two must have told Toue about my voice. I mean, Toue has known about Scrap for ages, but now he knows exactly how Scrap works.
He'll want to get his hands on me as soon as possible.
...But that doesn't matter. The fact is, I need to get to Toue too.
In which case, might it not make sense to walk right into his trap?
Whether we take the bait or not, it's all over if Toue gets to hold his Celebration.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Maybe it is a trap, but either way, it's a chance to get to Toue."

name: クリア
message: "Don't worry, Ren. I'll keep Aoba safe."
Clear confidently thumps a fist against his chest.
Clear staggers, clutching his arm―the same arm that was sparking earlier.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let me know if it gets worse, okay?"

I'm worried about Clear... but we need to get going.

We start toward the tower.
